children.name: Deposit_Disclosure
children.value: Based on the information you provided, we will require a deposit of $~order_attribute|deposit_amount~ to continue processing your order

children.name: Deposit_Question
children.value: Would you like to pay that deposit now, hear about waiver options or learn more about our no-deposit prepaid product?

children.name: low_income_agent_note
children.value: Agent: the low income option splits the deposit into two equal paymernts - half due now, half due on the first bill. The others are actual waivers to remove the deposit entirely. You can select a radio to see more information on how the customer is eligible for the option. If the customer is eligible for a 100% waiver, process them forward for one of those (they don't need more than one).

children.name: payment_question
children.value: Would you like to make a payment now with me, pay in person at a pay station or pay later?

children.name: dap_scripting
children.value: For a lower cost option, Budget Pass is a one-time, non-refundable payment that is managed through a third party. This option’s charge is less than the traditional standard amount.

children.name: pay_now_script_2
children.value: Agent: Postpaid Products can accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, NYCE, Purse, Star and Accel. Do not enter hyphens when entering the card number. Security code is short code on the back of the credit card.

children.name: success_script_radio
children.value: Okay - we're all set here! Your account number is ~order_attribute|debtor_number~. We have your service scheduled to start on ~order|requested_date~ and the customer service phone number is ~global|site_phone_number~ in case you need to contact us. We know you have a choice in providers and we thank you for choosing ~brand_name~!

children.name: not_successful_response
children.value: I'm sorry we are not able to take your payment now. An agent will reach out to you when the system is working again. Here is the phone number for customer care for you to try again later ~global|site_phone_number~. Your account number is ~order_attribute|debtor_number~.

children.name: payment_info_script
children.value: Your payment must be received within 15 calendar days to avoid order cancellation.

children.name: payment_station_script
children.value: You can pay in person at a Walmart, HEB or Western Union. We also have other options listed on our website at https://www.directenergy.com/texas/customer-support/payment-locations-texas

children.name: look_up_options_script
children.value: Would you like me to look up options in your zip code?

children.name: agent_note_pay_in_person
children.value: Agent:  Change the map selections to just show payment locations and enter zip code.  There is a list available underneath the map.

children.name: payment_info_script2
children.value: Your payment must be received within 15 calendar days to avoid order cancellation.

children.name: pay_later_script
children.value: You can call our Customer Care team at ~global|site_phone_number~ 24/7 to make the payment using our IVR system or directly with an agent.

children.name: pay_later_script2
children.value: Okay - we're all set here! Your account number is ~order_attribute|debtor_number~. Your service will be scheduled once the deposit is paid. Our customer service number is ~global|site_phone_number~ in case you need to contact us. WE know you have a choice in providers, and we thank you for choosing ~brand_name~!

children.name: enroll_fail_script
children.value: Sorry, We're unable to enroll your DAP. Would you like to continue with standard deposit?

children.name: cross_sell_fcp
children.value:
Deposit Freedom Option

Don't want to pay a deposit? No problem! Just sign up with Deposit Freedom. We've teamed up with our sister company, First Choice Power, to help get you started today. This trusted Texas electricity company will get power to your home without a deposit. And when you pay your electricity without disconnection for the first 60 days on this plan, you will be eligible for an exclusive no-deposit plan. Are you interested?

children.name: secure_deposit_required_cross_sell
children.value:
Analyst Note. Add display value children plain text with this name:
  • popup_description: lightbox text before redirect
  • markets: Additional markets beside inherited order's market. Value is coma delimited

children.name: popup_description_disabled
children.value:
~order|first_name~ you will be redirected to First Choice Power site

You have selected a plan from First Choice Power (FCP). By clicking continue you will be redirected to First Choice Power order page.

children.name: prepaid_script
children.value: We have some great options for prepaid products. In addition to no deposit, this product offers daily text or email communications on your usage - putting you more in control of the energy you use!  For just $10 we can get you started.  Does that sound like the right product for you?

children.name: benifits_list
children.value:
• No Deposit
  • Prepaid product - pay as you go
  • Daily communication in text/email - puts you in control of your usage

children.name: eligibility_script
children.value: To prove eligibility you would need:

children.name: driver_license_eligibility
children.value: • Copy of driver's license for account holder showing 62 years or older

children.name: license_checkbox_label
children.value: Customer wants to use this option

children.name: cancellation_script
children.value: Your waiver request must be processed within 15 calendar days to avoid order cancellation.

children.name: request_info_script
children.value: To request this option you would send in:

children.name: copy_dl_62
children.value: • Copy of driver's license for account holder showing 62 years of age

children.name: sen_in_62
children.value: You can submit this information using email, fax or postal service - which would you prefer?

children.name: mail_address_postal_62
children.value: • Mail Address: Direct Energy ATTN: Deposit Waiver P.O. Box 180 Tulsa OK 74101-0180

children.name: all_set_script
children.value: Okay - we're all set here. Your account number is ~order_attribute|debtor_number~. Your service will be scheduled once your waiver is processed or the deposit paid. Our customer service number is ~global|site_phone_number~ in case you need to contact us. We know you have a choice in providers, and we thank you for choosing ~brand_name~!

children.name: move_forward_script
children.value: Once we receive your documents, your deposit amount will be waived by our back office. An agent will contact you if there are any questions.

children.name: violence_waiver_elig_script
children.value: To prove eligibility you would need:

children.name: violence_forms
children.value: • Completed Certification Letter developed by the Texas Council on Family Violence. The form must be signed by the victim of family violence and state agent

children.name: site_info
children.value: • Utility waivers available online at http://tcfv.org/resource-center/survivors/ (advise customer to use the "Electric Service" form on the Utility waivers tab)

children.name: violence_checkbox_label
children.value: Customer wants to use this option

children.name: eligibility_script
children.value: To prove eligibility you would need:

children.name: low_income_forms
children.value: • One of the following (if either apply, review examples that are acceptable)

children.name: low_income_legal_forms
children.value:
• Copy of state-issued document indicating low income
  • Bill or Letter from current provider showing eligibility

children.name: customer_option_label
children.value: Customer wants to use this option

children.name: cancel_script
children.value: Your waiver request must be processed within 15 calendar days to avoid order cancellation.

children.name: request_script
children.value: To request this option you would send in:

children.name: form_options
children.value:
• The form that we just discussed
  • Account Number: ~order_attribute|debtor_number~

children.value: You can submit this information using email, fac or postal service - which would you prefer?

children.name: mail_address_low
children.value: • Mail Address: ~brand_name~ ATTN: Low Income P.O. Box 180 Tulsa OK 74101-0180

children.name: close_low_income_script
children.value: Once we receive your documents, your deposit amount will be waived by our back office. An agent will contact you if there are any questions.

children.name: close_low_income_script
children.value: Okay - we're all set here. Your account number is ~order_attribute|debtor_number~. Your service will be scheduled once your waiver is processed or the deposit paid. Our customer service number is ~global|site_phone_number~ in case you need to contact us. We know you have a choice in providers, and we thank you for choosing ~brand_name~!

children.name: Waiver_options_question
children.value: Would you like to hear about out Letter of Credit or Letter of Guarantor waiver options?

children.name: letter_of_credit_question
children.value: A Letter of Credit is a letter from your current provider that shows you are in good standing for the past year. Does that sound like something you could get?

children.name: yes_radio_label
children.value: Yes, they can get the letter

children.name: no_radio_label
children.value: No, they can't get the letter of guarantor - go back to ask about Guarantor letter question

children.name: waiver_credit_letter
children.value: Your waiver request must be processed within 15 calendar days to avoid order cancellation.

children.name: send_in_letter_credit
children.value: To request this option you would send in:

children.name: letter_from_elec_company_script
children.value: • Letter from current electricity provider stating that your account has been in good standing for the past 12 months

children.name: how_to_submit_credit_script
children.value: You can submit this information using email, fax or postal service - which would you prefer?

children.name: mail_postal_credit
children.value: <li>Mail Address: ~brand_name~ ATTN: Deposit Waiver P.O. Box 180 Tulsa OK 74101-0180

children.name: guarantor_question
children.value: Do you know a Direct Energy residential customer whose account is in good standing who would act as a guarantor of your deposit?

children.name: no_guar_label
children.value: No - go back to last question and pick none of the above to close call

children.name: fifteen_day_guar
children.value: Your waiver request must be processed within 15 calendar days to avoid order cancellation.

children.name: request_guar
children.value: To request this option you would send in:

children.name: postal_address_guar
children.value: • Mail Address: Direct Energy ATTN: Deposit Waiver P.O. Box 180 Tulsa OK 74101-0180

children.name: how_to_submit_guar_script
children.value: You can submit this information using email, fax or postal service - which would you prefer?

children.name: no_options_chosen_script
children.value: Unfortunately, these are all of the options I have. If you would like to think about it and contact us late, please remember that you will have 15 calendar days before this order will be cancelled. Please contact us at ~global|customer_care_phone_number~ and reference account number ~order_attribute|debtor_number~. We know that you have a choice of providers, and we appreciate you choosing ~brand_name~.

children.name: agent_note
children.value: Agent - this information is provided for your information, Please do not read all of this to the customer. When required in the script, you can read it if the custoemr asks.

children.name: deposit_script_2
children.value: Would you like to pay that deposit now or learn more about our low cost Budget Pass option?  We also have options to waive or split the deposit including if the account holder is 62 years or older, is eligible for low income assistance or is a victim of family violence.

children.value: Your waiver request must be processed within 15 calendar days to avoid order cancellation.
